long_description: The GoFit Cross X-Trainer gloves add necessary protection for your hands during a weightlifting workout. Double-layer synthetic leather palms feature pads with a grippy pattern to provide a sure hold of barbells and kettlebells. Terry cloth thumbs give you a soft place to wipe perspiration from your brow. Loops at the bottom of the gloves help you pull the gloves on; pull tabs extend from the middle fingers to ease removal. Stretch mesh on the backs of the hands breathes well and moves with your hands.
short_description: The GoFit Cross X-Trainer gloves add necessary protection for your hands during a weightlifting workout.
